statements.select: select p.OldManId,p.IDNo,p.OldManName,p.Gender,ro.SickBedNo,ro.BeginDate,ro.EndDate from Oca_OldManBaseInfo p right join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on p.OldManId=ro.OldManId left join Pam_Room r on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where ro.EndDate>GETDATE() and r.StationId=#StationId# and r.RoomId=#RoomId# and p.Status=3 and p.ResidentStatus=7 order by ro.CheckInTime desc

select a.*,b.SickBedNo from Pam_Room a left join Pam_RoomOldMan b on a.RoomId=b.RoomId and b.EndDate>GETDATE() where a.Status=1 a.StationId=#StationId# a.FloorNo=#FloorNo# a.RoomId=#RoomId# order by a.FloorNo,a.RoomNo

select a.RoomId,a.RoomNo,a.ExtNo,a.BedNo,a.OccupancyNumber,b.Id,b.OldManId,b.BeginDate,b.EndDate,b.SickBedNo from Pam_Room a inner join Pam_RoomOldMan b on a.RoomId=b.RoomId where a.StationId=#StationId# and b.OldManId=#OldManId# order by b.CheckInTime desc

select r.RoomId,r.RoomNo,r.ExtNo,r.BedNo,r.OccupancyNumber,r.FloorNo, o.OldManId,o.OldManName,o.Gender,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetGenderName(o.Gender) GenderName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetAge(o.IDNo)Age,o.IDNo ,ro.BeginDate,ro.SickBedNo from Pam_RoomOldMan ro left join Pam_Room r on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId left join (select OldManId,Status,ResidentStatus,StationId, OldManName, Gender, IDNo from Oca_OldManBaseInfo where Status=3 and ResidentStatus=7 and StationId=#StationId#) o on ro.OldManId=o.OldManId where ro.EndDate>GETDATE() and r.Status=1 and r.StationId=#StationId# order by ISNULL(r.FloorNo,r.RoomNo),r.RoomNo
